_sText:
THIS IS A REMAKE OF zm_omi_facility_b2!!

I give full credit to "Ominae" for making the Original Version.. 

I would like to thank App7e For putting up with my endless questions, helping with ideas and beta testing :D. Thanks!

This is my first time ever using hammer. Took me about a week to get to THIS final version, After about 13 betas :/

:note: 
This Map is optimized for unlimited ammo/no reload

:: Some of the Changes ::
1: Full Light.
2: Optimized the Map, Atleast Twice as much fps now. 
3: Every room has been Changed. Some More then Others.
4: Added My own rooms
5: Added Teleport and Fire Trap :D

I added alot more but ill let you figure that stuff out for yourself :D

Enjoy Peeps..
